name: Punkbuster 2069
description:
A short FPS featuring three levels, two linear and one arena. A concept game made during TAMK GameCamp 2020. 

Clear the streets of punks with your trusty pistol, assault rifle and shotgun or fight against an unending army of thugs who just don't stop coming and see how long you can survive!

CONTROLS:

WASD - movement

Space - jump

Mouse 1 - shoot

Scroll wheel - switch weapon

TEAM:

Eero Salmi, programming & level design

Others to be filled later
